name: Die 4te Offenbarung
description: Undeads crawling out of their graves, Ratmen fight out tribal wars, Orcs band together, Trolls populate the islands, Goblins terrorize the ordinary highways and many other evils trying to take over world domination - The Time for the 4th coming has arrived!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP/Windows Vista®/Windows® 7 (Updated with the latest Service Packs) with last DirectX® 9.0c Processor: Packs) with last DirectX® 9.0c 1.6 GHz Pentium® IV or equivalent AMD Athlon® processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX™ compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista®/Windows® 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX™ compatible video card
